Package eu.opends.trigger

Class SendNumberToParallelPortTriggerAction

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.trigger.TriggerAction
eu.opends.trigger.SendNumberToParallelPortTriggerAction
public class SendNumberToParallelPortTriggerAction
extends TriggerAction
This class represents a SendNumberToParallelPort trigger action. Whenever a collision with a related trigger was detected, the given number will be sent to the parallel port for the given number of milliseconds.
Author:
Rafael Math

  • Constructor Details

    • SendNumberToParallelPortTriggerAction

      public SendNumberToParallelPortTriggerAction​(float delay, int maxRepeat, int number, int duration)
      Creates a new SendNumberToParallelPort trigger action instance, providing number and duration.
      Parameters:
      delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
      maxRepeat - Maximum number how often the trigger can be hit (0 = infinite).
      number - Number to sent to the parallel port.
      duration - Number of milliseconds until "0" will be sent.
